description:
Spicy Mycena Waffles (SMW) is an extension of the original Super Mario World Archipelago implementation
that features several core changes for better or for worse.

waffles-v1.0.0r2.description:
Initial release

# Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Setup Guide](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/#setup)
* [Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.0.0)

# KNOWN ISSUES
* Universal Tracker may fail to track correctly some slots. Requires some investigation on my end.
* Blocks aren't collected
	* Collect may have additional issues, I don't use `!collect` in games. Feels bad. May fix at some point...?
* Star Blocks aren't properly colored to match their contents
* There are some entity-entity priority issues in the overworld map and the Bowser fight
* There _may_ be some areas that have weird graphics or "invisible" enemies/entities or even impossible setups. Please report them alongside your seed to see how to work around those on my end. (This is Enemy Shuffle exclusive)
* The Mario in the map border will animate in response to the D-Pad inputs if ice physics were present in the last level the player entered
* Some things may get cut with incoming messages. Will be fixed later once deciding what's the best course of action to fix the issue
* P-Switch/Star music may keep playing after entering a door. Will cause a audio driver crash on certain emulators, requires investigating further for finding the actual trigger, any kind of detailed report will help to find the cause.
* Morton Castle may disconnect on hitting Vine Block #1 (requires investigating, will appreciate detailed reports)
* Donut Secret 2 may disconnect on hitting Directional Coin Block #1 (requires investigating, will appreciate detailed reports)
* Donut Plains 4 sends a powerup block check immediately
waffles-v1.0.0r2.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.0.0

waffles-v1.1.0r2.description:
More locations!
# Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Setup Guide](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/#setup)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.1.0)
# Main changes
## Additions
* Visiting rooms can grant a check
* Added an item (`Trap Repellent`) which blocks incoming traps in a level
* It's now possible to select which abilities or items will be added to the item pool or will be in the player's inventory at generation
## Adjustments
* Midway Points are now colored according to the item's classification they have
* Altered Universal Tracker's behavior for Glitched:tm: logic, it always assumes Hard logic instead of the very next logic level
* Several Enemy Shuffle adjustments to placements feel more fair
## Fixes
* Universal Tracker now properly tracks Glitched:tm: logic for swapped level exits
* Fixed Goals not being properly colored when level exits are swapped
* Fixed fireballs in boss arenas (and possibly other places)
* Fixed Star Blocks not being properly colored when they're valid locations and haven't been collected
* Some logic adjustments
waffles-v1.1.0r2.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.1.0

waffles-v1.1.1.description:
Minor fixes
## Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.1.1)
* Should be backwards compatible with version `1.1.X`
## Adjustments
* Disabled save prompts (for real)
## Fixes
* Universal Tracker now properly tracks Glitched™ logic for swapped level exits (for real)
* Some logic adjustments
* Small Enemy Shuffle backend adjustments
waffles-v1.1.1.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.1.1

waffles-v1.1.2.description:
Minor fixes v2
## Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.1.2)
* Client should be backwards compatible with versions `1.1.X`, though these changes will only be noticed after generating a new seed
* Collect has issues related to teleports, please avoid taking stars in Star World from levels that were collected.
  * If you took one and are stuck in a void level, try erasing the `.srm` or `.SaveRAM` file related to the slot and restart the emulator and client.
## Fixes
* Music engine no longer crashes on some emulators when the Directional Coins stop their music without a P-Switch active
	* As a side effect, the P-Switch effect will be carried over pipes and doors
* Hearts and Repellents no longer have a disabled sign on top of them
* Some logic adjustments
waffles-v1.1.2.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.1.2

waffles-v1.2.0.description:
This was supposed to be released on Nov/24 but I got side tracked with the Adjuster XD
# Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.2.0)
# Additions
* BUMPED MINIMUM AP VERSION TO 0.6.5. WE'RE USING `SnesReader`!!!!
* Starting location shuffle
	* No longer restricted to Yoshi's Island as a starting area
* Players can now warp to the starting location (the tile, not the actual level) from anywhere by pressing `L+R` while standing on a level tile in the map
* Carryless Secret Exits
	* Keyholes are replaced with Goal Orbs at random
* Adjusted level map tiles depending on which level the location has
	* Also listens to the level exit shuffle setting and will inform the player via a different level tile on the map
* Added a basic Manager/Adjuster which can edit a few things on an already generated seed
	* Enable, disable or change the Enemy Shuffle seed
	* Set local and global Graphics Packs
		* Local pack will override the global one
		* Global packs will always be loaded, similar to LTTP's adjuster
	* Export a template Graphics Pack from a Waffles ROM
	* Create a new Graphics Pack from a folder
	* More to come at a later date
* Initial Deferred Entrances™  support for Universal Tracker
	* It basically doesn't spoil the entire location list at once and tells players which levels they've not visited at all
	* Toggleable from Universal Tracker's settings in `host.yaml`
* New Glitched™ logic for some locations has been implemented for Universal Tracker
# Adjustments
* Beaten castles no longer require `L+R` to enter, players can enter them with `B` or `A`
* Removed RNG element from American Footballs
* Consistent names for Star World locations
* Some Enemy Shuffle and logic adjustments
# Fixes
* Boss Rooms no longer make the player fall of the platform if the P-Switch is active
* Forest of Illusion 2 is no longer permanently marked as Glitched™  on Universal Tracker
* Some blocks aren't automatically sent upon loading a level
* Stars no longer keep playing the song if they haven't been unlocked
* Blocks are now detected properly as locations for FxPak users
* Character GFX packs now properly show the actual name with palettes in the HUD
# Known Issues 
* There are some entity-entity priority issues in the overworld map and the Bowser fight
* There _may_ be some areas that have weird graphics or "invisible" enemies/entities or even impossible setups. Please report them alongside your seed to see how to work around those on my end. (This is Enemy Shuffle exclusive)
* The Mario in the map border will animate in response to the D-Pad inputs if ice physics were present in the last level the player entered
* Some things may get cut with incoming messages. Will be fixed later once deciding what's the best course of action to fix the issue
* DP1 Tile doesn't show correctly its swapped exit status
waffles-v1.2.0.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.2.0

waffles-v1.2.1r3.description:
I was playing games the entire day, I forgot to push the update XD
# Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.2.0)
* Update if you're playing v1.2.0. Not backwards compatible with v1.1.2.
# Fixes
* Fixed a logic bug where Yoshi was always considered available on starting locations other than Yoshi's Island
* Fixed a logic bug that didn't consider cape flying for Star World 5 - Normal Exit
* Fixed clients crashing when stepping into Front Door or Back Door
* Added support for Map Palettes when creating Graphics Packs from MM102's Aseprite script
* Fixed FoI3 carryless rule not considering a way to get into the Orb
* Changed an options default value
* Made test happier
waffles-v1.2.1r3.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.2.1

waffles-v1.2.4.description:
Experimental changes based on information gathered from watching a few of Panga's streams and my own gameplay. Also a few logic fixes
# Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.2.3)
# Changes
## Adjustments
* Early double exit levels will have a higher chance to roll a carryless exit
* Early double exit levels will have a lower chance to roll a swapped level exit
## Fixes
* VD2 carryless secret exit and dragon coins now expects carry to move around P-Switches
* Adjusted FoI3 logic to be consistent in every single check
	* Also adds a Glitched:tm: logic case where it expects zero items to reach the normal exit
* Forced carry requirement for most of Outrageous' checks
* Fixed graphics packs not being properly applied if the legacy setting wasn't available
waffles-v1.2.4.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.2.4

waffles-v1.2.6.description:
🤝 
# Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.2.6)
# Changes
## Additions
* ~~Stole~~ Ported Core SMW feature that saves visited levels in memory for tracking purposes
## Fixes
* VD2 with carryless exit should no longer cause the generation to fail
* Makes fuzzer happier
	* Fixed failed generations with level shuffle set to off and enabling swapped/carryless exits
waffles-v1.2.6.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.2.6

waffles-v1.2.7.description:
options.
# Info 
* [Information](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/)
* [Full Changelog](https://thelx5.github.io/smw/changelog/#1.2.7)
* Probably not backwards compatible with already generated games
# Changes
* Added a Midway Point tracker (item & location) at the top of the map
* Added a Prize Block coin counter to levels with one of those
* Made Wall Run Anywhere and Fast Swimming rely on `L` or `R` to function
	* This can be toggled on the adjuster. It's off by default and can be saved to persist across sessions.
* Added an option to make Yoshi's Tongue be unlocked with two items 
	* `Progressive Yoshi` becomes `Yoshi` when this option is disabled. Enabled by default.
* Added an option to make Wall Run Anywhere be unlocked with two items 
	* `Progressive Run` becomes `Run` when this option is disabled. Enabled by default.
* Added an option to make Fast Swimming be unlocked with two items 
	* `Progressive Swim` becomes `Swim` when this option is disabled. Enabled by default.
* Fixed Top Secret Area not being considered as a level with a Green Yoshi
* Fixed an issue with Wall Run Anywhere not working properly at the edges of VD1
* Fixed Midway Points having glitchy graphics
* Enemy Shuffle adjustments
	* Bowser Statues no longer appear in SW1
waffles-v1.2.7.title: Spicy Mycena Waffles v1.2.7
